long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enhance your browsing experience with SwiftBrowse! Easily configure and activate various apps to perform quick searches right from your browser. Simply select text, right-click, and seamlessly search across your favorite apps without ever leaving your current tab. Streamline your workflow and access information faster than ever before!
